description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. AAC is a falling block match three puzzle game with grid rotation added into the mix.  The player has control over the falling blocks rotation and can shift the order of the colored blocks.  With each rotation of the grid your combo grows.
description.short: AAC is a falling block match three puzzle game with grid rotation added into the mix.  The player has control over the falling blocks rotation and can shift the order of the colored blocks.  With each rotation of the grid your combo grows.
